content.text: Celebrities should n't be the only ones grabbing the Gold this awards season . Shop now for your own ' gilty ' pleasures ! The world just witnessed an epic round of wins for the culture , at this year 's 91annual Academy Awards ! Yes , we all sat and applauded at the TV as our faves walked onstage to collect their prizes - but celebrities should n't be the only ones grabbing the Gold this awards season . In honor of all things Hollywood - especially the glitz & glam - we 've rounded up a slew of golden fashion accessories and clothing items to help you shine bright , with style inspiration taken straight from our fashion pages in this month 's ESSENCE magazine . A few of them might be a bit pricey , but do n't clutch your pearls , sis ! It never hurts to add a little sparkle to your shopping wish list ! View our Golden gallery below and shop now for your own ' gilty ' pleasures !
